title: Laser
description: A laser ('light amplification by stimulated emission of radiation') is a device that emits light through a process of optical amplification based on the stimulated emission of electromagnetic radiation.

Type.description: Type is the general category of laser.

LaserMedium.description: The Medium attribute specifies the actual lasing medium for a given laser type.

Tuneable.description: Whether or not the laser is Tuneable.

Pulse.description: The Pulse mode of the laser.

PockelCell.description: If true the laser has a PockelCell to rotate the polarization of the beam.

RepetitionRate.description: The is the rate in Hz at which the laser pulses if the Pulse type is 'Repetitive' hertz[Hz]

Name.description: A user defined name for this element

ID.description: A LightSource ID must be specified for each light source, and the individual light sources can be referred to by their LightSource IDs (eg from Channel).

NominalPower.description: The nominal power of the light-source

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of the component

SpecsFile.description: Attach a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer

tier.description: The tier level of this component.
